mapper.select: select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from rental where member_num = #{member_num}

select * from ( select r.rental_num,r.regdate,h.hall_name,r.rental_date,r.rental_time,r.rental_state from rental r join hall h on (r.hall_num = h.hall_num) where r.member_num = #{member_num} order by r.rental_num desc ) where rownum = 1
select r.*,h.hall_name,ra.answer_content from rental r join hall h on (r.hall_num = h.hall_num) left join rental_answer ra on (r.rental_num = ra.rental_num) where r.rental_num = #{rental_num}

select * from ( select r.*, rownum rnum from( SELECT r.rental_num, h.hall_name, r.rental_name, r.rental_title, r.rental_date, r.rental_time, r.regdate, r.rental_state FROM rental r, hall h
r.hall_num = h.hall_num
AND ${sort} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by rental_num desc )r ) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
SELECT rental_num, hall_num, rental_date, rental_time,rental_title FROM rental WHERE rental_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} ORDER BY rental_date asc, rental_time asc
